mapper.insert: insert into bookReview(reviewNum, bookNum, reviewName, reviewContent,reviewScore) values((select nvl(max(reviewNum),0)+1 from bookReview),#{bookNum},#{reviewName},#{reviewContent},#{reviewScore})
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, reviewNum, bookNum, reviewName, reviewContent,reviewDate,reviewScore from (select * from bookReview where bookNum = #{bookNum} order by reviewNum desc))
mapper.update: update book set bookTitle=#{bookTitle}, bookContent=#{bookContent} where bookNum=#{bookNum}
